# index(after:)

**Instance Method**

Always traps.

## Declaration

```swift
func index(after i: EmptyCollection<Element>.Index) -> EmptyCollection<Element>.Index
```

## Discussion

`EmptyCollection` does not have any element indices, so it is not possible to advance indices.
